Modifications.Value: Causes the hero to summon Dark Minions every time it casts a spell. The minions last 45 seconds.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Summons 1 minion.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Summons 2 minions.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Summons 3 minions.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Summons 4 minions.
Causes the hero to summon 1 Dark Minion every time it casts a spell. The minion lasts 45 seconds.
Causes the hero to summon 2 Dark Minions every time it casts a spell. The minions last 45 seconds.
Causes the hero to summon 3 Dark Minions every time it casts a spell. The minions last 45 seconds.
Causes the hero to summon 4 Dark Minions every time it casts a spell. The minions last 45 seconds.
